title: I've had a speaker issue where it could shake and produce a screchy noise on my screen, it cracked.
content: I had this issue where my speaker would shake the device and produce cringy noises, a couple days ago it cracked when i was using it from the speaker, now the speaker has lowered in volume. Google support says that i have to pay for the crack even though I am still in my 2 year warranty time period.
